unnormalised: The Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) has announced the schedule for the upcoming Ranji Trophy season. The tournament will commence on 05/01/2025 and conclude with the final match on 15/03/2025. Teams will be divided into groups, with matches played across various venues including the Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai and the Eden Gardens in Kolkata.
normalised: The Board of Control for Cricket in India (B-C-C-I) has announced the schedule for the upcoming Ranji Trophy season. The tournament will commence on fifth January two thousand and twenty five and conclude with the final match on fifteenth March two thousand and twenty five. Teams will be divided into groups, with matches played across various venues including the Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai and the Eden Gardens in Kolkata.

unnormalised: Key fixtures include the clash between Tamil Nadu and Karnataka scheduled for 20/01/2025, a highly anticipated encounter. The semi-finals are slated to begin from 01/03/2025, with specific timings to be confirmed later. The BCCI aims to complete all matches before IPL season starts, tentatively scheduled for the end of March '25.
normalised: Key fixtures include the clash between Tamil Nadu and Karnataka scheduled for twentieth January two thousand and twenty five, a highly anticipated encounter. The semi-finals are slated to begin from first March two thousand and twenty five, with specific timings to be confirmed later. The B-C-C-I aims to complete all matches before I-P-L season starts, tentatively scheduled for the end of March two thousand and twenty five.

unnormalised: All matches will begin at 9:30 AM IST, with daily updates provided on the official BCCI website. Fans can also follow live scores and match highlights on various sports channels. The board anticipates a successful season, fostering emerging talent and promoting the sport across the country.
normalised: All matches will begin at nine thirty A-M I-S-T, with daily updates provided on the official B-C-C-I website. Fans can also follow live scores and match highlights on various sports channels. The board anticipates a successful season, fostering emerging talent and promoting the sport across the country.
